name: A Letter Arrives
description: %PERSON_NAME and %ENTHRALLED_NAME are now close friends, and you can depend on them as a reliable political ally, as long as you don't offend them in a major fashion.

choices.name: Continue to reinforce the friendship
choices.description:
Continue work on gaining favour from %PERSON_NAME, boosting their liking towards your noble

-80% chance to gain 35 liking

-20% chance to lose 10 liking

outcomes.description: %PERSON_NAME enjoys the company of your enthralled noble, and their conversations are pleasant and productive. They gain 35 liking towards your enthralled. The efforts continue...
A misplaced word, and social-misstep. %ENTHRALLED_NAME fails to charm %PERSON_NAME this time, and loses 10 points of liking. The efforts continue...

choices.name: Abuse your friendship for your own gains
choices.description: Your enthralled noble gains 10 prestige, at the cost of losing 45 liking from %PERSON_NAME

outcomes.description: %ENTHRALLED_NAME's social persona twists, and they become contemptuous towards %PERSON_NAME, publicly mocking them and aggrandising themselves at the cost of their perhaps former friend.
